document.full_text: a nato-led air strike killed 13 libyan rebels, a rebel spokesman said on saturday, but their leaders called for continued raids on muammar gaddafi's forces despite the "regrettable incident."
document.title: coalition "friendly fire" kills 13 libyan rebels
lines_and_colors: a nato-led air strike killed 13 libyan rebels, a rebel spokesman said on saturday, but their leaders called for continued raids on muammar gaddafi's forces despite the "regrettable incident."
